short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable all cache with support for whitelisting certain domains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A must have extension for web-developers that need no cache. This extension disables the cache for all websites, but with the additional support of whitelisting certain websites. The whitelisted websites will keep their cache.
